ing: 7 (16 ounce) cans kidney beans, rinsed and drained
des: "My dad's friend used to serve this as an appetizer in his restaurant in Ipswich, Mass.  He shared it with us many years ago and it has been a family favorite ever since. Serve with crackers or favorite crudites."
ins: In a medium bowl, stir together beans, onion, garlic, mayonnaise, and relish. Season with salt, white pepper, and mustard. Mix well, and refrigerate for several hours before serving.
